com.Controller

Class Kal2000

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Controller.Kal2000

  • public class Kal2000
extends java.lang.Object
    Kal2000 is the controller. Contain "dataBase" : private ArrayList films6beerVideo; private ArrayList clients; private HashMap dvds; Can save en load data from files

    • Field Summary

      private java.lang.String path

      • getClient

        public Client getClient(java.lang.String password,
               int idCard)
                 throws PasswordException
        Return a Client by compare password and idCard, This method is used to connect a client.
        Parameters:
        password - the client password
        idCard - the id of the card insert in Al2000
        Returns:
        the found client or throw PasswordException
        Throws:
        PasswordException - if Incorrect Password

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(Client client,
           int idCard)
             throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Return the card from a Client and the idCard (idCard given by card reader in Al200)
        Parameters:
        client - the client
        idCard - the id of the card
        Returns:
        the Card found
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if no card found raise this exception

      • boot

        public void boot()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                 java.io.IOException
        This method allow Al2000 to boot Load database from Saving File
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if doesn't find class in classpath
        java.io.IOException - if file not found, print : "/!\ save files not found"

      • powerOff

        public void powerOff()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                     java.io.IOException
        Power off All2000 Save all data in file
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException - if file not found, print : "/!\ save files not found"
